1.0.name: wordpress/linkflora-affiliate-program
1.0.description:
English

The module is for people who own a website based on WordPress CMS and would like to gain additional profits. We welcome you to join our affiliate system and earn 15% commission from every sale made by a customer that is transferred to us from your website. This enables you to earn high profits by helping us sell flowers with free delivery to any country in the world!

You can see the working demo here Linkflora Affiliate Program Widget
